OOG.content: authenticity, truth almost equals clarity (Klarheit) for Husserl
OOG.linkedContent: authenticity, truth almost equals clarity (Klarheit) for Husserl

IW.content: [vis-à-vis Rosenzweig] Protestantism makes faith come alive to its authenticity, new relation of religion to truth, no longer as correspondence (like science, objective knowledge) but as truthfulness (Wahrhaftigkeit), authenticity, most intimate Gewissen: [the Church?] internalizes what contests it
